net.unicon.cas.addons.ticket

Interface TicketSupport

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTicketSupport

    public interface TicketSupport
    Helper strategy API to ease manipulating CAS' Ticket's related APIs and add convenience methods on top of them.

    Note: this API is only intended to be called by CAS server code e.g. any custom CAS server overlay extension, etc.

    Concurrency semantics: implementations must be thread safe.

    Since:
    1.0.3
    Author:
    Dmitriy Kopylenko, Unicon, inc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteExpiredTicketGrantingTicket(String ticketGrantingTicketId)
      Convenience method that deletes a provided TGT from the underlying ticket store if that TGT is determined to be expired.
      List<org.jasig.cas.ticket.TicketGrantingTicket> getNonExpiredTicketGrantingTickets()
      Convenience method to return a collection of active (non-expired at the time of call) from CAS' underlying ticket store.
      boolean ticketGrantingTicketExistsAndExpired(String ticketGrantingTicketId)
      Convenience method to determine if a TicketGrantingTicket represented by a given id exists in a underlying ticket store AND it is expired

    • Method Detail

      • deleteExpiredTicketGrantingTicket

        void deleteExpiredTicketGrantingTicket(String ticketGrantingTicketId)
        Convenience method that deletes a provided TGT from the underlying ticket store if that TGT is determined to be expired. If the provided ticket does not exist in a ticket store, or not a TicketGrantingTicket, simply returns
        Parameters:
        ticketGrantingTicketId - for which to delete the underlying ticket NOTE TO IMPLEMENTERS: this method should never throw any exceptions - runtime or otherwise

      • ticketGrantingTicketExistsAndExpired

        boolean ticketGrantingTicketExistsAndExpired(String ticketGrantingTicketId)
        Convenience method to determine if a TicketGrantingTicket represented by a given id exists in a underlying ticket store AND it is expired
        Parameters:
        ticketGrantingTicketId - representing TicketGrantingTicket
        Returns:
        true if both predicate conditions satisfied, false otherwise NOTE TO IMPLEMENTERS: this method should never throw any exceptions - runtime or otherwise

      • getNonExpiredTicketGrantingTickets

        List<org.jasig.cas.ticket.TicketGrantingTicket> getNonExpiredTicketGrantingTickets()
                                                                                   throws BulkRetrievalOfTicketsNotSupportedException
        Convenience method to return a collection of active (non-expired at the time of call) from CAS' underlying ticket store.
        Returns:
        a list of non-expired TGTs OR an empty list and NEVER null NOTE TO IMPLEMENTERS: this method should never throw any exceptions other than BulkRetrievalOfTicketsNotSupportedException
        Throws:
        BulkRetrievalOfTicketsNotSupportedException
